Text: So is THIS the 70th anniversary edition? ;)
At 6 days I'm only at 11%. At this point I'm ready to throw in the towel and go with the smaller 720p version.

AVOID THIS! 
Bad Rip. It skips throughout the film. I appreciate the efforts of the original poster, but would have been nice if he had at least checked it before uploading.
Please excuse my previous comment. This torrent plays fine, just differently from all the others I've d/loaded. Just had to get the CCCP and find the correct codec. My apologies to the uploader.
